# delegate

**Instance Property**

The object for managing the sharing service picker.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any NSSharingServicePickerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate object must conform to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSharingServicePickerDelegate] delegate.

## Managing the sharing service picker

- **NSSharingServicePickerDelegate**: An interface for managing content for the macOS share sheet.
